alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 12 at 1:50PM MDT until March 15 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible mainly above 7500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 16 inches above 7500 feet with 3 to 8 inches across the lower slopes and in the valleys below. and on ridge tops and elevations above passes possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Sawtooths, Big Lost Highlands, and Sun Valley region. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could produce blowing and drifting snow and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
